props.accept: One or more [unique file type specifiers](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input/file#Unique_file_type_specifiers) describing file types to allow.
props.counterSizeString: The text displayed when using the **counter** and **show-size** props. Can also be customized globally on the [internationalization page](/customization/internationalization).
props.counterString: The text displayed when using the **counter** prop. Can also be customized globally on the [internationalization page](/customization/internationalization).
props.hideInput: Display the icon only without the input (file names)
props.multiple: Adds the **multiple** attribute to the input, allowing multiple file selections.
props.showSize: Sets the displayed size of selected file(s). When using **true** will default to _1000_ displaying (**kB, MB, GB**) while _1024_ will display (**KiB, MiB, GiB**).
props.truncateLength: The length of a filename before it is truncated with ellipsis

slots.selection: Slot for defining a custom appearance for selected item(s). Provides the current **index**, **text** (truncated) and [file](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/File).
